sentences.en: He told us that her age was forty-eight or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我们她的年龄在四十八岁左右。

sentences.en: Forty-eight hours have elapsed since his arrest.
sentences.cn: 他被捕后48小时已经过去了。

sentences.en: Temperatures in the shade can reach forty-eight degrees Celsius at this time of year.
sentences.cn: 一年中的这个时候，阴凉处的温度能达到48摄氏度。
